name: Aero Blitzer - Shelved
description:
Note: This project in its current model is shelved. Aero Blitzer will return differently in the future. This is the build running at Melbourne Supanova 2020

Aero Blitzer is a platform fighter in a destructible world. Fighters can bash, throw items and crash into the platforms to minimalise land to fight on. Punch your friends into submission but don't fall to your death!

  • Current Features:
  • 2-4 local player battle
  • 1 character to punch holes into people
  • destructible platforms
  • items to toss at each other

Controls

Note: 1 person can play on keyboard with Z,X,C,space and enter keys. You can connect up to 4 controllers, the buttons if they match Xbox layout shape line up to be A = jump, B = roll, X = attack. To pick items up, crouch on them and press attack. To quit game press the ESC key.
